favourite.article: YES, yes Lord. For all my Haitians, 'jezu se tout bagay pou mwen'.
I have been given the most precious treasure than any treasure in the world which is Jesus, my friend!
I love You Jesus, You blessed me beyond major. I can't praise You enough. I praise You, oh Lord.
I love You Jesus...You're such a wonderful friend to all the saints.... Amen....we are happy because we have You...
JESUS is the world to me... I love You Lord Jesus.
So beautiful song, Amen.
Just discovered this great song, love it.
Jesus is our everything. No matter what we go thru He's always there to comfort and also give us strength.
Soooooooo comfortable song.
This hymn can remind us who gives us our strength.
I love the song every single day of my life.

I was raised on this song. It was beautiful then when we sang it in church services, in the field chopping/picking cotton, gardening (my mother and my grandmother), or just sitting on the porch on a quiet summer's day. I am 67 and I often fall asleep singing, humming or thinking this song. Blessed to have it in my heart.

I praise my Lord and Savior, Who is my friend! I listened wholeheartedly to it in the still small hours of the day. What a comfort and exhortation, the whole hymn is, especially in the 3rd verse, "And true to Him I'll be", which is my commitment! As I am now traveling in this wonderful world of His "when life's fleeting days shall end", verse 4 is my comfort. I thank my Lord for Will L. Thompson for such a lovely hymn.

This has been my favorite song since my childhood & now into senior adulthood it still is. The words are my testimony, Jesus is All the World to Me! Now that the years are flying by and my age is too, the words to verse 4 mean even more to me!! Praise Jesus for being all the world to me!!!

Work up this morning singing this hymn. Started to read the Bible but this hymnal would not leave me. Meditating it. Reminding me as I recover from surgery that Jesus is my all and all. Glory! Hallelujah!!!
I woke up with this hymn from my sleep today. Jesus said to me, I'm your Friend.
Jesus really is ALL the world to me! What a powerful, moving song! I sing this song when I am happy and when I am down and it just has a way of calming my spirit.
For some reasons that I am surely not aware of, the words of this song cannot leave my lips. Truly, I want no better friend.
I don't know what I would do or where I would be without Jesus in control of my life. Without Him life wouldn't be the same and it is to Him I belong. To God be the glory forever and ever!!

Oh, Lord Jesus! He called us FRIENDS! LORD JESUS, my best Friend ever!!! How could I this Friend deny when He is so TRUE to me??!!! John 15:14-15 (King James Version)
14 Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.
15 Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his Lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
Jesus is all the world to me, He knows my mind, heart and soul more than I do. He is my everlasting Friend who gives me hope and joy. I couldn't ask for more.
Such a warm and inviting song. It is so gently played too, in your recording. I appreciate this site again as I learn more hymns!

'Jesus is all the world to me', to us, to His Body. Sojourning here on the earth. 'True to Him I'll be. Following Him I know I'm right.' Lord, draw us to find and live this inner, hidden life with You within our hearts. True to You, we know we are right. Peace, joy and love will then emanate and illuminate from us for others' salvation.
It reminds me that Jesus should be first. Love Him with all our heart, soul and mind.
Jesus of the Bible is more than all the world to me. He is closer to me than my own heart because He knows my heart more than I know myself.
I love this song, it uplifts my spirit, whenever I am down, this song cheers me up. It reminds me that somebody is there for me that carries all my burdens.
Jesus awakes me in the morning to a peaceful feeling, he closes my eyes at night with the gentle touch of his hand. He is my world, I love him so.
The Lord is forever by my side closer than a brother, He is so understanding of my faults and failures than any person. With a heart of thanks and tears, the Lord Jesus Christ is all the world to me.
